name: Frutakia 2
overview: Frutakia is back and better than ever. The titanic, frenetic match-3 puzzler. Match 3 line or more fruits just like the casino but with one major difference: go ahead and move any row, up or down! We dare you to discover its clever amazing puzzle games game play, play once and that’s it…most addicting games. Simple and clever game play quest, ideal for short periods of time. (E.g.: Recommend in buses, trains, queues, boss talking, etc.) Classic solid gameplay like the all time classic addicting games: Cubis, Popcap Bejeweled blitz, Zuma and Candy crush saga soda. The impossible challenge stack overflow. Triple lines. GAME OBJECTIVE: You must make clever groups of 3 or more cascade lines with the same fruit/items/diamond/jewel in any direction! Slide the fruits up or down with your finger or touch the lever which moves them all. WATCH OUT: Every time you move a fruit your life bar drops, and every time you match fruits your bar rises. If your life bar empties, you lose. If it fills all the way to the top, you get a level up and play with new and more valuable fruit (recommended). Also, try to match multiple fruit at the same time for a sugar rush cubism blast bubble dots! Enter the titanic slots, cubit games and make super combos up to the stratosphere. MODES: Easy: Take your time and have fun. Hard: For those who like frantic fun! This is a smart puzzle slots, NOT a casino game.
